# right derecia 𓂞 dar ذِرَاع ḏirāʿ dharm 𒆕 DU do! arm

𒈩𒌅 rit-tu •right hand
𒈩𒋾 ʷrit-ti wrist

𐀨 ra ⋍ 𓂋𓂝𓂞 ⇔ right

𓐤 𓂋 𓏤 𓇋 𓏏 𓇋 | judge | √right
𓐣 𓂝 𓏛 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏛 | judge | ⇔ do-right, writ

ambivalent right diRections!

𓇔 𓂋𓇓 R·SU #rsw ⲣⲏⲥ raš 𓁶 𓏤 𓇔 | the South | 𓁶 vs rück vs front 𓏅 𓈖 𓏏 𓈅 𓏤 "south" direction! RE- 𒊑 REᵏ rück prefix

𒍠 imittu ⇔ Maat ™
𒍠 al'imittu limit !

𒍠 zakµ 𐎘𐎋𐎎 ṯkm “shoulder” ⇔ rücken / right

𒍥 ZID right side 𒍥𒁺 zid-du "righteous"

𓅆 Greift 𓅆 𓏏 𓏮 غَرْب ḡrb “west” ⇔ West 𓋀 𓊿

𓄛 ⋍ 𐁇 in 𐀇𐁇𐀨 di-pte-ra /diptera/ διφθέρᾱ

𒀀𒋆𒌅 a-rik-tu <<
𒀀𒋆𒌅 (yoke-)shaft, a kind of spear, length
